articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: Vivo V40, V40 Pro expected in India this August: Report - Mint
articles.description: Vivo's upcoming V40 series in India is expected to be the 'slimmest phone' with a 5,500mAh battery, IP68 rating, and 3D curved display. The devices might also include Zeiss Optics and a cushioning structure for durability.
articles.content: Vivo is anticipated to launch its V40 series in the Indian market, following reports that suggest the series will succeed the V30 lineup. The forthcoming series is likely to include the V40 and the V… [+1978 chars]
